column1: FREE 2016 First Communion Catalog
column2: Ziegler's is happy to provide our customers a collection of our First Communion products in a convenient sized catalog. We have you covered for all of your Communion needs with an excellent variety of quality items to make the day special. Select the quantity of FREE catalogs you require and we will ship them to you FREE!

Jesus Speaks to Me | On My First Holy Communion | Hardcover
column2: In this gift book, Jesus speaks warmly and lovingly to children who are receiving him for the first time. In twelve scenes from Scripture, Jesus explains that it is his Father's plan for each child to be part of their family of love. He invites the child to be his friend and to draw close to him in the Eucharist and in prayer. Each Scripture scene is colorfully illustrated and the book features: An opening dedication page. Pages to record memories, including photos, church programs, and a space for children to write or draw on. You can list the names of those who attended the celebration. Traditional prayers such as the Our Father and Hail Mary.
